00103   /* 
00104    * Prototypes of exported functions 
00105    *
00106    * FNV_INITS    - initializes serial vector operations for main problem
00107    * FNV_INITS_Q  - initializes serial vector operations for quadratures
00108    * FNV_INITS_S  - initializes serial vector operations for sensitivities
00109    * FNV_INITS_B  - initializes serial vector operations for adjoint problem
00110    * FNV_INITS_QB - initializes serial vector operations for adjoint quadratures
00111    *
00112    */
00113 
00114   void FNV_INITS(int *code, long int *neq, int *ier);
00115   void FNV_INITS_Q(int *code, long int *Nq, int *ier);
00116   void FNV_INITS_S(int *code, int *Ns, int *ier);
00117   void FNV_INITS_B(int *code, long int *NB, int *ier);
00118   void FNV_INITS_QB(int *code, long int *NqB, int *ier);
00119

00121 }
